Guy first unlocks seven chakra gates, then kicks his opponent high into the air. He then quickly jumps after his opponent and uses a chakra-powered punch to send them back down.

[[es:Gran Entrada de Espíritu Quemador]]
[[pl:Kake Agaru Atsuki Tamashii]]
